Articles.Content:
I just had to pop in and congratulate all the people at SQUAD and the fans. I'm am proud to say I was there in the beginning and helped KSP grow. My time at SQUAD was some of the best times I've had working with an online community. I wish SQUAD nothing but the best in their future.

Again, well done guys! You deserve all the accolades that can be thrown your way.

![RdN3r.png](http://i.imgur.com/RdN3r.png)

Forever your friend,

Capt'n Skunky

Former Community Manager

PS: Before anyone asks, Kerbal Comics is no more. I've left the site and existing comics up for those that have never seen them and those that wish to revisit for nostalgia purposes.

Heh... knew it'd be a matter of time.

Welcome back, Skunky.

Nice to see you again Skunky. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Great timing to show up for the 1.0 release. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

nice to see you again-

you'll always be my captain!

y'arrrrr!

Capt'n'Skunky! How have you been old buddy?

It has been too long, since you where last on the forums (You have been missed, old friend!)

Do you still play KSP when you get some time?

May your Rockets fly Far and True...
Hey Capt'n'Skunky!! Great to see you again man! How's it going?

Arr! Good to see ya, Capt'n ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And because you didn't say it....

Happy Launching!
Glad to see you old friend. -DR
Good to see you again Capt'n!

Agreed as a day 1 player back in the day..it's nice to see this baby make it's way to 1.0 status. On ward and upward.

> 
> I just had to pop in and congratulate all the people at SQUAD and the fans. I'm am proud to say I was there in the beginning and helped KSP grow. My time at SQUAD was some of the best times I've had working with an online community. I wish SQUAD nothing but the best in their future.
> Again' date=' well done guys! You deserve all the accolades that can be thrown your way.
> 
> [url'][http://i.imgur.com/RdN3r.png](http://i.imgur.com/RdN3r.png)
> 
> Forever your friend,

> Capt'n Skunky

> PS: Before anyone asks, Kerbal Comics is no more. I've left the site and existing comics up for those that have never seen them and those that wish to revisit for nostalgia purposes.
Skunky! Good to see you again! I hope life is treating you well. Take care, don't be a stranger! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Capt'n, good to see you again sir.

\*Ahem\*

"Welcome (back) to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky"
Good to see you again Capt'n
